resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.position: Data Analyst Intern at KPMG India
experiences.bullets: ‚óè Designed and developed a flight booking system as part of Internship at KPMG India. , ‚óè Developed a sophisticated Flight Booking System using Java Spring Boot and MySQL as the backend technologies, enabling concurrent access for multiple users to book flights without conflicts or data inconsistencies. , ‚óè Implemented robust concurrency control mechanisms to prevent issues such as overbooking and data corruption, ensuring a seamless and reliable user experience. , ‚óè Utilized React for the front-end, building a user-friendly interface that simplifies the booking process and enhances the overall user experience. , ‚óè Conducted comprehensive testing and debugging to ensure the system's stability and responsiveness under heavy concurrent loads

experiences.position: Hardware Engineer Intern(GEEDS Team) at Valeo
experiences.bullets: Worked on making guidelines for selection of components based on manifacturing methods and standards. Took into account various factors such as cost, regulations, etc.

education.universityPara: Electrical and Electronics Engineer with a minor in Computer Sciences . Specialized in VLSI design and Database Management.
